front.title: Elliptic-Curve Diffie-Hellman Key Exchange for the SSH Transport Level Protocol

abstract.t: This document describes new key exchange algorithms based on Elliptic Curve Cryptography (ECC) for the Secure Shell (SSH) protocol. In particular, it specifies the use of Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) key agreement and ECDH with cofactor multiplication key agreement in the SSH Transport Layer protocol.
